item.title: Teaching
item.author: jbsousa@ucp.pt (João Brogueira de Sousa)
item.description: NOTE: This page is currently under construction and will be updated often. In case you don't have a GitHub account, sign up for free and clone or download the course's repository linked below. Python for Finance, MSc in Finance at Universidade Católica Portuguesa You can find the course material in this GitHub repository. Intro to Python, MSc in Economics at Universidade Católica Portuguesa New material coming soon.

item.title: About
item.author: jbsousa@ucp.pt (João Brogueira de Sousa)
item.description: I'm a postdoctoral researcher in Economics at Universidade Católica Portuguesa, in Lisbon. In this website you can find a list of published articles and work in progress. You can find most of the code I use for research and teaching on GitHub.
